title: Bocchi The Rock! - Bokita Ga Irekawaru Hanashi (Doujinshi)
alternative_title: Bocchi-Kita Change ; ぼ喜多が入れ替わる話 ; BoKita ga Irekawaru Hanashi
status: Bocchi-Kita Change ; ぼ喜多が入れ替わる話 ; BoKita ga Irekawaru Hanashi
description:
Description :
        Circle MIX-ISM's "Bocchi the Rock!" Volume 3 is here!One day, Bocchi-chan and Kita-chan suddenly swapped bodies!? They try to hide it, but their bandmates quickly catch on. The Gotou family is also perplexed by Hitori-chan (who is Kita-chan), who's suddenly so outgoing.This body-swap comedy is full of slapstick humor and even a little bit of lewd content!
